events.name: The Digital Barn
events.about:
Calling all designers, developers and geeks.

Join us for a day of talks, hacks, gaming and general digital marvelousness at:

The Digital Barn

Saturday February 11th, 2012

For more info, or to let us know that youd like to speak, go to www.thedigitalbarn.co.uk

Keep up to date by following us on Twitter @thedigitalbarn
